name: Mystery Trackers: Raincliff
storyline: After a group of young students go missing, the Mystery Trackers are called in to search the city of Raincliff! Tackle this difficult case and unravel the strange mystery to save the students! Explore the entire town and discover who is watching your every move. Carefully dissect scenes and piece together perplexing puzzles and save the missing students!
summary: After a group of young students go missing, the Mystery Trackers are called in to search the city of Raincliff!
